FuncDef:
The mep ccm-send enable command enables a MEP in an MA to send CCMs.
The undo mep ccm-send enable command disables a MEP in an MA from sending CCMs.
By default, a MEP is disabled from sending CCMs.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a MEP. If this parameter is not specified, all MEPs in an MA are enabled to send CCMs or disabled from sending CCMs.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run the mep ccm-send enable command to enable the MEP to send CCMs after a MEP is configured using the mep mep-id command.
Prerequisites
An MD, MA, and MEP have been configured using the cfm md, ma, and mep mep-id commands, respectively.
